abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Fires a ball of shrapnel that explodes at the target area after 1.5 seconds, damaging and slowing enemy units. Reveals the targeted area. Provides vision for the duration.
abilities.notes: Uses charge-based system with maximum of 3 charges. Damages enemies in an area over time while slowing them.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper's precision can knock back and slow his target, and has a chance to deal bonus damage on attacks.
abilities.notes: Has a chance to deal bonus damage and slow the target. Knocks back most units other than buildings and rooted units.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Sniper increases his attack range. Can be activated to gain bonus damage and True Strike for a limited time, but reduces his attack range during this time.
abilities.notes: Passively increases attack range. When activated, grants bonus damage and True Strike but reduces attack range.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot. The attack cannot miss and deals bonus damage based on how far away the target is.
abilities.notes: Has a long cast delay but deals massive damage. With Aghanim's Scepter, damages and stuns all enemies in an area.
